content: Should we rename WellKnownTrait::SizedTrait to WellKnownTrait::Sized or WellKnown::SizedTrait? I originally thought that WellKnown would be a collection of all lang items, not only traits, that's why I named SizedTrait the way it is instead of Sized.
I guess WellKnownTrait::Sized, since you can then also remove the word "Trait" from the other variants
Is there any potential need in lang items other than traits?
If there are, those probably wouldn't be in the same enum
I'll make a pr then, seems fairly uncontroversial
